Let $a,b,$ and $c$ be positive integers with $a\ge b\ge c$ such that\\
\begin{align*} a^2-b^2-c^2+ab&=2011\text{ and}\\
a^2+3b^2+3c^2-3ab-2ac-2bc&=-1997\end{align*}\\
What is $a$?\\
\\
$ \textbf{(A)}\ 249
\qquad\textbf{(B)}\ 250
\qquad\textbf{(C)}\ 251
\qquad\textbf{(D)}\ 252
\qquad\textbf{(E)}\ 253
 $
